attributes.additional_details: UK is the one of most popular country where students come from all over the world for getting a  higher education and they pay a lot of amounts on accommodation and university fees. this virus spread all over the world and the International student is also affected so if you provide them support or relief in the shape of fees and accommodation then this will be a good gesture from you and it will help them a lot in this situation
attributes.background: The UK government and Parliament should give them relief in University fees and Accommodation/House rents
